title: march 4: drama at the louvre (with Joshua Henry)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the construction of the glass pyramid that marks the entrance to the Musee du Louvre in Paris, and the dramatic journey it took to be built. We also hear from a special musical guest, Joshua Henry. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
